title: Public UI refresh: Heroicons swap, mobile typography tuning, remove Home banner slider, and polish Bottom CTA bar/menu

requirements.summary: Swap all public-facing `lucide-react` and `react-icons` icons to Heroicons without changing any admin UI or public behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: All public pages and shared public components use Heroicons instead of `lucide-react` and `react-icons` (e.g., Navbar, Footer, SectionTitle, Bottom CTA Bar, Home sections, and other public pages listed in feature_evidence.json).
No public routing, data wiring, or functionality changes occur; only icon components are swapped.
Build succeeds with Heroicons installed and no remaining imports from `lucide-react`/`react-icons` in public components.

requirements.summary: Reduce oversized public-page title typography on mobile in shared title components and hero titles while keeping md+ styling intact.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/public/SectionTitle.tsx` uses smaller heading sizing on mobile (e.g., mobile < current `text-3xl`) while keeping equal or near-current sizing on md+ breakpoints.
`frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` mobile title sizing is reduced to be visually balanced (current `text-3xl`), while md+ remains strong/heroic.
No layout structure changes are introduced beyond typography scaling (no reflow-heavy redesign).

file_operations.description: Adjust Tailwind heading classes so the public section title renders smaller on mobile (below current `text-3xl`) while keeping md+ sizing near-current; keep layout structure unchanged.
Reduce the public hero title font size on mobile (below current `text-3xl`) while preserving md+ hero styling; avoid any structural/layout redesign.

requirements.summary: Remove the Home page main banner carousel/slider rendering while keeping all other Home sections and data wiring intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The carousel/banner slider section is no longer rendered on `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`.
Featured vehicles, CTA banner image section, About section, Search section, and Latest blog section remain present and functional.
No backend changes are required; no CMS data model changes are introduced.

file_operations.description: Remove the main banner carousel/slider section and its related imports/constants from the public Home page while leaving other sections, hooks, and CMS-driven data usage unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update the mobile Bottom CTA Bar to 50px height with square corners while keeping the same four actions and colors.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/navigation/BottomCtaBar.tsx` renders at exactly 50px height on mobile (replacing current `h-16`).
Bottom bar container and button corners are square (remove rounded top corners currently applied).
All four actions remain: Call, WhatsApp, Credit Simulation, Main Menu; existing colors remain (#C90010, #398E3D, #FEA500, #0166C0).
Tap targets remain usable at 50px height (icons/text scaled appropriately without truncation).

file_operations.description: Change the public Bottom CTA Bar mobile height from `h-16` to a 50px height, remove rounded top corners from the bar/buttons for square edges, and tune icon/text sizing to avoid truncation while keeping the four actions and existing color blocks.

requirements.summary: Align the Bottom CTA 'Main Menu' dropdown directly above the blue button and polish public dropdown/sheet styling without changing behaviors or admin UI.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user taps the blue 'Main Menu' action in the Bottom CTA Bar, the menu panel opens positioned directly above the blue box (aligned horizontally with that button), not as a generic full-width bottom sheet.
The menu dropdown closes on outside tap and on navigation item click, and animations/transitions remain smooth.

Public dropdown/sheet menus (e.g., Bottom CTA menu and Navbar mobile sheet) receive visual polish (spacing, typography, dividers, hover/active states) while keeping existing navigation items and behaviors unchanged.
No `/admin` components, routes, or styles are modified.

file_operations.description: Replace the public Bottom CTA Bar 'Main Menu' bottom sheet behavior with a minimal dropdown/popover-style menu that anchors to the blue Main Menu button and opens directly above it; ensure close-on-outside-tap and close-on-item-click remain. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Refactor the public menu panel component to support the new anchored dropdown positioning/styling (or replace it with a menu component used by BottomCtaBar) while keeping the same navigation items and close-on-navigation behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Polish the public Navbar mobile sheet menu styling for a cleaner/minimal look (spacing, dividers, typography, hover/active states) while preserving all navigation items, routing, and behaviors. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
